alert.note: Alert for Northeast Mountains (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 19 at 1:14PM PST until January 20 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER TRAVEL TO RETURN TO PORTIONS OF NORTH CENTRAL AND NORTHEAST WASHINGTON INTO THE IDAHO PANHANDLE... .A weather system will spread a mixed bag of precipitation into the Inland Northwest tonight into Thursday morning. A wintry mix including areas of light freezing rain is expected from Leavenworth through the Wenatchee, Chelan, and Waterville areas. Meanwhile over northeast Washington into the Idaho Panhandle light to moderate snow is forecast. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO NOON PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches north of Deer Park and Athol. * WHERE...Eastport, Sandpoint, Colville, Northport, Bonners Ferry, Orin-Rice Road, Athol, Newport, Flowery Trail Road, Chewelah, Springdale-Hunters Road, Kettle Falls, Schweitzer Mountain Road, and Priest River. * WHEN...From 1 AM to Noon PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
